metadata.title: CVE-2024-28576 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theopj_j2k_tcp_destroy() function when reading images in J2K format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
